name: Gem Drop 3D
description:
A match 3 game with some depth! Select any gem in the cube and click a gem on any side of it to swap places. If 3 or more of the same gem are in a row, they'll disappear, you'll score points and more gems will be added. 

Be quick, though! You don't have a lot of time to find the matches!

 Use the 'w', 'a', 's' and 'd' keys to rotate or tilt the cube for a better look!
